name: financial-tracker
description: * Installation Guide   - Your need a server, download node.js   - You need a DATABASE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM (DBMS), download postgres   - Fork the repository and push to your `staging branch`   - Go to command prompt and run `npm init` to download all dependencies   - Merge to your `master` and compare forks with the original repository   - Open a Pull Request   - Create a database with postgres `fin_tracker` and run `npm run build` command prompt   - Finally run `npm run server`
